table:columns.name: transect_id
table:columns.description: Unique identifier for each transect, constructed from coastline, segment, and distance.

table:columns.name: lon
table:columns.description: Longitude coordinate of the transect origin.

table:columns.name: lat
table:columns.description: Latitude coordinate of the transect origin.

table:columns.name: bearing
table:columns.description: Bearing angle of the transect, measured clockwise from the north.

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Transect geometry as a Well-Known Binary (WKB) LineString.

table:columns.name: osm_coastline_is_closed
table:columns.description: Indicates whether the source OpenStreetMap coastline forms a closed loop (e.g., an island).

table:columns.name: osm_coastline_length
table:columns.description: Total length of the source OpenStreetMap coastline in meters, summed across UTM zones.

table:columns.name: utm_epsg
table:columns.description: EPSG code representing the UTM Coordinate Reference System of the transect.

table:columns.name: quadkey
table:columns.description: Spatial index for the transect origin, following the Bing Maps Tile System.

table:columns.name: continent
table:columns.description: Name of the continent where the transect is located.

table:columns.name: country
table:columns.description: ISO alpha-2 country code for the transect's location.

table:columns.name: common_country_name
table:columns.description: Common name of the country where the transect is located.

table:columns.name: common_region_name
table:columns.description: Common name of the region where the transect is located.

table:columns.name: dist_b0
table:columns.description: Distance (m) from the transect origin to the nearest OpenStreetMap coastline intersection at bearing 0°.

table:columns.name: dist_b30
table:columns.description: Distance (m) from the transect origin to the nearest OpenStreetMap coastline intersection at bearing 30°.

table:columns.name: dist_b60
table:columns.description: Distance (m) from the transect origin to the nearest OpenStreetMap coastline intersection at bearing 60°.

table:columns.name: dist_b90
table:columns.description: Distance (m) from the transect origin to the nearest OpenStreetMap coastline intersection at bearing 90°.

table:columns.name: dist_b120
table:columns.description: Distance (m) from the transect origin to the nearest OpenStreetMap coastline intersection at bearing 120°.

table:columns.name: dist_b150
table:columns.description: Distance (m) from the transect origin to the nearest OpenStreetMap coastline intersection at bearing 150°.

table:columns.name: dist_b180
table:columns.description: Distance (m) from the transect origin to the nearest OpenStreetMap coastline intersection at bearing 180°.

table:columns.name: dist_b210
table:columns.description: Distance (m) from the transect origin to the nearest OpenStreetMap coastline intersection at bearing 210°.

table:columns.name: dist_b240
table:columns.description: Distance (m) from the transect origin to the nearest OpenStreetMap coastline intersection at bearing 240°.

table:columns.name: dist_b270
table:columns.description: Distance (m) from the transect origin to the nearest OpenStreetMap coastline intersection at bearing 270°.

table:columns.name: dist_b300
table:columns.description: Distance (m) from the transect origin to the nearest OpenStreetMap coastline intersection at bearing 300°.

table:columns.name: dist_b330
table:columns.description: Distance (m) from the transect origin to the nearest OpenStreetMap coastline intersection at bearing 330°.

table:columns.name: sds:change_rate
table:columns.description: Rate of shoreline change (m/year) derived from satellite-derived shorelines (SDS).

data.title: Global Coastal Transect Repository (GCTR)
data.description:
A Parquet dataset containing coastal transects and derived attributes, including intersection
distances to OSM coastlines at multiple bearings and shoreline change rates from the ShorelineMonitor dataset.

table:columns.name: transect_id
table:columns.description: Unique identifier for each transect, constructed from coastline, segment, and distance.

table:columns.name: lon
table:columns.description: Longitude coordinate of the transect origin.

table:columns.name: lat
table:columns.description: Latitude coordinate of the transect origin.

table:columns.name: bearing
table:columns.description: Bearing angle of the transect, measured clockwise from the north.

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Transect geometry as a Well-Known Binary (WKB) LineString.

table:columns.name: osm_coastline_is_closed
table:columns.description: Indicates whether the source OpenStreetMap coastline forms a closed loop (e.g., an island).

table:columns.name: osm_coastline_length
table:columns.description: Total length of the source OpenStreetMap coastline in meters, summed across UTM zones.

table:columns.name: utm_epsg
table:columns.description: EPSG code representing the UTM Coordinate Reference System of the transect.

table:columns.name: bbox
table:columns.description: Bounding box of the transect geometry, defined by minimum and maximum x (longitude) and y (latitude) coordinates.

table:columns.name: quadkey
table:columns.description: Spatial index for the transect origin, following the Bing Maps Tile System.

table:columns.name: continent
table:columns.description: Name of the continent where the transect is located.

table:columns.name: country
table:columns.description: ISO alpha-2 country code for the transect's location.

table:columns.name: common_country_name
table:columns.description: Common name of the country where the transect is located.

table:columns.name: common_region_name
table:columns.description: Common name of the region where the transect is located.

table:columns.name: dist_b0
table:columns.description: Distance (m) from the transect origin to the nearest OpenStreetMap coastline intersection at bearing 0°.

table:columns.name: dist_b30

table:columns.name: dist_b300

table:columns.description: Distance (m) from the transect origin to the nearest OpenStreetMap coastline intersection at bearing 330°.
